events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it was the wrong size and I would like to request a refund for the order.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a return and money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the jacket so we can process your refund?
My order number is 34567. The jacket is too small and doesnâ€™t fit properly, so I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label for the return.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response and for providing the return label. I appreciate your help.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the refund to appear.
Just following up to ensure that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
We are closing your refund case now. Thank you for contacting support, and please let us know if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a brief survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
